official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act for the purpose of improving certain provisions of the medicare program.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide that the reasonable cost of physical, occupational, speech or other therapy services shall be based on a reasonable rate per unit of service rather than on a reasonable salary paid for such services as is now the case. Removes the $100 limitation on "outpatient physical therapy services" furnished to an individual while an inpatient of a hospital or extended care facility.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act for the purpose of improving certain provisions of the medicare program.
